Services

Based in London, we specialise in developing REST API using Java and Spring Boot but we can also do Angular and a bit of ReactJs

Software Development

DevOps

About

Codenest is committed to working with our clients to help them achieve their own strategic goals. We strives at all times to provide the best possible value to its clients by delivering top quality services - you get on with your real work, and leave the rest to us.

  • August 2017

    Our Humble Beginnings

    We're taking off by associating with Solirus for better goverment software solutions.

  • March 2018

    Entering Financial Services

    We entered into finance and payment products by working with Tesco Bank on a pure greenfield project to redevelop their existing payment app called Tesco Pay+.

  • July 2018

    Our First Global Client

    Big coorporate companies have their challenges - we associated with HSBC to work on internal staff digitisation tablet app to improve efficiency and modernise service provided by branch staff.

  • October 2018

    Continuing The Global Journey...

    We are in process of developing a brand new Challenger Bank for a major global bank.
